title: The Protagonist’s Ill White Moonlight, He Will Die Soon - Novel Updates
tags: Cunning Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Obsessive Love   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Seme Protagonist   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sickly Characters   Suicides   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unrequited Love   World Hopping
author: 期期小风
description: Transmigrated as the sickly white moonlight, who can't wait to cough up three liters of blood every day, Chu Yu's character is pitiful, weak and green tea, which exists in various stand-in literature. He becomes an existence that thousands of readers scorn and hate.>
